content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) transferring coal between chests

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) extracting iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting the ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) transferring materials

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5) collecting iron ore
- Multiple burner inserters coordinating transfers

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input wooden chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters coordinating material transfers

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Power generation setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0) heating water
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5) generating power
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft without required resources
- Ensure all required ingredients are available in inventory before attempting crafting operations

### Errors when attempting to extract from invalid positions
- Move to the correct position before attempting to extract resources
- Verify the target position contains extractable resources

### Entity status warnings
- Keep furnaces supplied with fuel to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent "chest is full" bottlenecks
- Ensure proper input/output connections to prevent "no input liquid" warnings in fluid systems
